articles.author: Chaim Gartenberg
articles.title: Apple quietly discontinues the Beats Pill Plus, its last battery-powered speaker - The Verge
articles.description: Apple’s Beats Pill Plus speaker appears to have been quietly removed from both the Apple and Beats websites, leaving the company entirely without a battery-powered speaker in its product lineup.
articles.content:
Apple appears to have quietly discontinued the Beats Pill Plus, with the portable wireless speaker no longer appearing on either Apple or Beats websites, as spotted by 9to5Mac. 
Originally released … [+1468 chars]

articles.title: Motorola Moto G71 5G launched in India - India Today
articles.description: The Moto G71 has been launched at Rs 18,999 in India. It is powered by a Snapdragon 695 chipset, 50-megapixel triple rear cameras and a 5000mAh battery. The device will go on sale starting January 19.
